website_summaries.verdict: If you're worried you won't get it right the first time, this kit comes with access to an online community of support for suggestions.
pros: Comes with money-back guarantee, even if the only piece you have left is the empty box to return
cons: The starter kit doesn't include a brewing jar

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Provide a good SCOBY with sufficient starter tea.. COMPLETE FAIL
customer_reviews.text: I wasted a month trying to get this to create the Kombucha.. Their tech support said everything was going good but after a month of fermenting in an 81 degree environment (which should have created a super acidic Kombucha),,, nothing,, The tech support insisted the Kombucha was good. So I started a second ferment... There was ZERO fermentation after 5 days. All of this leads me to believe that the starter scoby and starter tea was insufficient to start the reaction. So this was a complete waste of money and TIME. They say its sufficient for 5 gallons of tea, and I couldn't even get 1 gallon made.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: 1st Time Kombucha brewer here, and I’ve got to say: buy this kit. Easy to follow instructions, everything you need for your first few brews and an absolutely healthy and beautiful scoby. Word of newbie advice: I started with a 2-gallon 1st time brew. For the size of scoby, start smaller (1-gallon), as it took close to 3 weeks for my first batch. On the upside, the original scoby was so healthy it produced a very healthy and large baby. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Very sad
customer_reviews.text: My husband just starting getting into drinking Kombucha, so for his birthday, I bought this kit. The kit was not easy to use. So, my husband asked an expert and they were able to make it. However, the Scoby was not right. Mold formed and the scoby/fermentation never happened... no bubbles. I would no recommend this product. Very very sad.
customer_reviews.author: w l e

customer_reviews.title: Kombucha is so simple to brew, it makes a batch of beer seem like a chore.
customer_reviews.text: I received this kit for my birthday last month, and have just bottled my second batch. The first (1 gallon) batch turned out amazing. It yielded 3 pints and enough to start a 2 gallon second batch. It also grew another SCOBY. Second batch filled 12 pints and two quarts with enough left to start the third batch. I've flavored each pint with six pieces each, raspberries or blackberries, and a few with both. The last bottle (quart) I used elderberry extract because I ran out of fresh berries. I'm very excited to see how they all turn out when their finished carbonating.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hensley

customer_reviews.title: shop ahead and find this cheaper and save some $ bucks.
customer_reviews.text: I think the contents are overpriced for the $ cost. I wished that I had priced shopped before making this.purchase. I would not recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This company is great - my hubby recently got into Kombucha frenzy and ...
customer_reviews.text: This company is great - my hubby recently got into Kombucha frenzy and spending about 6 dollars per day to purchase two bottles of Kombucha from Whole Foods. I decided to cut that expense by ordering this kit, it works. We received a giant Scoby, which produced another giant baby Scoby within one week. It brewed very nice Kombucha, and now a few weeks later we are brewing 3 gallons at a time! This company is also very responsive, we had one question to ask while brewing our first batch and emailed them around 8pm, they responded within 30 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, 2
customer_reviews.text: This kit is okay, its about 25 bucks overpriced. I thought I was getting some sort of unicorn SCOBY but it is the same as any other one you would buy from any other seller. For 50 bucks you don't even get a jar to brew in. There are so many kits online for ~30$ that have literally everything you need. My kit is also missing the PH strips and the Temperature gauge. Definitely overpaid for this, scoby is floating in tea right now, ill update with how it grows.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S

customer_reviews.title: Second kit molded within 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in the past month. The first time the batch never did get to the right ph level or taste. So I decided to try it again and this time I put a temp strip on container to make sure temp was within temp suggested and this one molded. I’m super disappointed as I researched and even bought a book and followed the instructions to a tee and signed up for the kombucha group they offer. At the cost I’ve literally poured down the drain at this point, it would’ve been cheaper to just buy the bottled kombucha. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Holland's

customer_reviews.title: SCOBY Dead
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to try this with my teenage son (who loves kombucha), but I think the SCOBY must have been dead. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Price is too high
customer_reviews.text: This package provides quality ingredients, however the price is way too high. It's a small quantity of all ingredients that I could have easily purchased separately for about half the price of the kit. Also, the directions include items that did not come in the basic kit such as a funnel. Now that I know more about brewing kombucha I definitely do not recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Kombucha Starter Kit with plenty of Scoby
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start making my own Kombucha so I purchased the Kombucha brewing bundle starter kit. Product comes with a nice amount of Scoby to handle 5 gallon container and easy to follow step-by-step instructions. You will need to purchase the bottling bottles and 5 gallon glass tea container separately. Perfect starter kit for understanding the Kombucha process.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: You will be buying more things soon. Research what all you need.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting what I needed to make my first batch. Must haves: Digit ph tester Some type of heater(heating pad works great, just keep an eye on temperature) A thermometer (I used a meat thermo. Stuck it beside to keep guesstimate of temp) A gallon glass jar with wide mouth(2 if your a heavy drinker) Be sure to find reliable sources, for when you have questions. Everyone seems to do things a little differently.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Get This Kit--It's Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I firmly believe I could have probably started my own scoby and bought all the necessary ingredients and equipment myself. However, buying this reasonably priced kit was worth it. In my box, I received fool-proof instructions, excellent tea, organic sugar, and even rubber bands and little bits I didn't even consider before making this purchase. I am supremely thankful I invested in this kit. It is well worth the money. Not only that, but I like to think I'm supporting a really cool company. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect - great, colorful, easy instructions and quick start guide; high quality of the scoby, the herbal combinations for flavoring, the labels and other extras to make it look professional and give you beautiful and tasty results. I was thrilled that my first batch is not overly sweet, the way kombucha I buy in the stores is. The organic tea included is just wonderful. I am so happy with all of it - so well thought out, and made with love.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: I'm annoyed by the directions
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in today, it didn't come with a container to make it, which it should've said. Then it says "to make a 5 gallon container", well I can't find any 5 gallon containers online, just 2.5. Now with the scoby, do I cut it in half since it's a 2.5? Can I save the other half? How do I store the other half? How do I make it again? It doesn't explain the whole starter tea thing, do I need another scoby after that? The whole thing is confusing and I wanted to love this, very disappointed I might take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit although not great value, its convenient to have all this in one box.
customer_reviews.text: If you can find the individual parts and order them you will probably save some money, so I'm not giving this great points for value. the included cover cloths are too small for my crock. The SCOBY is a decent size and comes in liquid in sealed plastic. My first batch is happily fermenting so must be a good scoby. The included sugar was enough for initial 2 gallon batch, there is plenty of tea left over. I'm happy it got me started, and in future I'll just buy the individual items.
customer_reviews.author: Rolfe J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did everything according to the directions but no new scoby grew. I'm not sure what went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Priduct defective. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this kit. Followed the directions to a T and after 10 days, still no fermentation. Scoby was apparently no longer alive. I guess I should have known when it just sank to the bottom and stayed there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dehydrated Scoby and Vague instructions (not for beginners)
customer_reviews.text: Followed instruction to allow water to cool down to warm bath water temperature only to find other instructions that say room temperature or you damage the scoby. First batch took two weeks before anything started to happen then after just forming the new white mother mold took over. 3 weeks to get a Scoby I think the dehydration plus poor instructions to use warm bath water temp was too vague and contributed to a total waste of money. I have looked everywhere to request a refund or another Scoby but of course its been too long now and Amazon heuristics wont let me navigate to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Whatcha got brewin?
customer_reviews.text: I had been seeing all over the internet about Kombucha. I had decided at this point that I wanted to make my own so that I could see what Kombucha is all about. I bought the kit and it arrived very quickly. I took all the ingredients out and they are all premium ingredients and a very large scoby. The directions were great (including the adorable drawings) and it made it very simple to understand the steps. I got a good set of four 1 gallon jars for brewing and I currently have two of them working hard I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mimiroo

customer_reviews.title: ... of Kombucha into our starter kit and it tastes amazing! You don't have to know too much to ...
customer_reviews.text: We are maybe 100+ gallons of Kombucha into our starter kit and it tastes amazing! You don't have to know too much to get started, but once you know what you're doing adding flavors or "forgetting your batch" isn't such a stress. Good starter kit! With the kit I bought, I had to buy a 2 gal jug separately. The kit came with fabric covers and rubber bands, though, which was nice. Prepare to buy additional pH testers if you make more than a few batches. They're cheap, only a couple bucks per hundred strips.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bewley

customer_reviews.title: Expired for 2 months when received
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. Ordered on Dec 1, opened on Christmas, then made a batch on the 28th. The instructions were good and the ingredients looked high quality. The issue we had was that after further inspection, a sticker on the side states that it’s Best Buy 10/19. That means it’s 2 months expired... we will be throwing this batch out. Check the expiration date if you order this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kryzer

customer_reviews.title: Kombucha Success!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to make kombucha on my own with a scoby from a friend. I read online tutorials and watched videos, but something went wrong. I was hesitant to buy this kit, fearing I would make the same mistakes. But the instructions were very clear and the scoby was really hearty. I waited to make sure no problems would emerge, but I'm two batches in and everything is good. I'm currently in the 2nd stage fermentation of my 2nd round of kombucha. The scoby produces healthy, vigorous daughters and the kombucha tastes great. This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sexton

customer_reviews.title: conflicting & confusing instructions, too much sugar, not enough supplies
customer_reviews.text: Is this kit for stoners, by stoners? Seriously, I suggest a copy writer or at least Autocorrect and getting your basic brewing instructions to not conflict between what comes in the package and what is on the website link indicated on same package. And I find it frustrating that this is called a brewing kit because when I went to brew my first batch, I realized I did not have all of the supplies necessary to complete the process. Lame. Buyer beware, no returns.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not sure......
customer_reviews.text: I heard and read how easy it was and how hard it would be to mess up. Well this was an expensive experiment that did not work well for me. I had mold. Though I followed directions EXACTLY. I also kept it at the correct temperature and in an open closet as recommended. Lots of people had success... but I was not one of them. Now I'm out $50 in starter kit and back to square one.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin Val

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to start
customer_reviews.text: Received by Kombucha starter kit today. Excited to start brewing with quality ingredients. I've brewed before in the past, but this starter kit provides everything you need except water and a glass brewing jar. Even includes the breathable jar cover and big rubber bands. Tea is very nice quality. Your home Kombuca is only as good as your starting ingredients, this is a good start. Thank you GetKombuca.com
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: this is what you want if you're new to kombucha brewing. easy to follow instructions. also comes with covers so when you're buying a gallon jar to make this in, don't bother getting the one with cheesecloth because it's more expensive and you don't need it. the people at this company provide support and were extremely helpful to me when i was getting started. i'm on my third batch and feel like an expert kombucha brewer thanks to all their help.
customer_reviews.author: SRQ girl

customer_reviews.title: ... that cost almost 50$ you would expect at least good packaging. You pretty much get a 4oz of ...
customer_reviews.text: For a kit that cost almost 50$ you would expect at least good packaging. You pretty much get a 4oz of tea blend, rubber band, breathable cloth, nylon glows and few literally few stripes all mixed together like they coudnt at least separated them into small zip lock bags, and cane sugar. Overall ok but not worth 47$
customer_reviews.author: Dominika

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kit had everything I needed!! I have started my first brew of Kombucha! So glad to be able to make it at home and no longer have to pay the high retail price! The kit is straight forward and fool proof! Dave's customer service is amazing! I would recommend this kit to anyone who is thinking of starting their own home brew!
customer_reviews.author: Peterson Family

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a scoby!
customer_reviews.text: While this scoby is amazing. I would encourage you to just buy a scoby and google how to do the rest. I don't feel like this product is worth the price especially since you still have to buy a jar to ferment in.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with an many thing s as some other kits.
customer_reviews.text: This kit works fine, but you will have to buy your own gallon jug and bottles. For a similar price you can get other kits that comes with more stuff out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: which is nice, but it doesn’t come with much else
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of two kombucha kits I bought. It is really, just okay... the scooby it comes with is HUGE, which is nice, but it doesn’t come with much else. For the price, you can get a kit that includes everything (including glass and flavors). Not that this is a bad kit, I just think for a “starter kit” it should include everything.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: First off this product is amazing and superfun
customer_reviews.text: First off this product is amazing and superfun!!!! I had a blast making it and putting it together. I will be honest, I did just make the tea today to get it started for the fermentation process however I tried the tea on its own and it was amazing! If the tea can taste that damn good then the kombucha must be amazing. I will follow up and post another review once I have actually tasted the finished product. Thanks Getkombucha!!
customer_reviews.author: Edguil1

customer_reviews.title: Come for the SCOBY. Stay for the Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I did PLENTY of research before purchasing this Get Kombucha Brewing Starter Kit. What set this kit apart were two things: First, the SCOBY that came with the kit was MASSIVE (seriously HUGE), and two, I was impressed by the sheer volume of rave reviews regarding the customer supporte offered by Dave, the owner (i.e., you email him with questions, and he responds.) As a newbie, that level of assistance was important, and I highly recommend this kit for others who -- like me -- didn't have a clue what they're doing. P.S. I'm about to start the second fermentation stage of my first batch. Wish me luck!! -- L.L. Powell
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Scoby is huge!
customer_reviews.text: Have my first batch 'brewing' as I write this. The scoby is huge. She's sitting a couple inches off the bottom, taking up the entire circumference of my gallon jar. Time will tell how proficient I am at this. Already purchased a two gallon jar for my 2nd batch. My wife and I love the flavor. Kombucha Dave genuinely cares about his customers and products.
customer_reviews.author: Northof46

customer_reviews.title: Customer service rocks
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, and they ain't wrong, the customer service rocks. There are a ton of videos to help you relax with the "trying something new" fear factor. But you can also email GetKombucha with seemingly silly questions all throughout the process and "Ela" is going to get back to you and she is a customer service phenom! She is an "epic brewmeister" and very personable. I'm almost thru day 5...ooooh...so exciting!
customer_reviews.author: MyThots

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent kit, and the seller has been top-notch
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent kit, and the seller has been top-notch. The kit itself comes with all your basic needs for ingredients to make kombucha. The scoby arrived healthy and ready to ferment. The seller has been in touch with me the entire time to make sure that I am satisfied with my order. I never had any issues with the order; the seller was just being proactive, which is why I am posting this 5-star review. I definitely recommend this kit and Get Kombucha!
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife since she loves the GT kombucha. She didn't actually open the box for several months, but the scoby was still viable and she's on her third batch now. She spent a lot of time looking things up online to make sure she was doing it right, so I guess there could have been a little more info included in the kit, but we're both really happy with it. She also ran out of pH strips pretty quickly, but those were inexpensive and easy to replace. Overall, this was a great product (and price) for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great Kombucha Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great kit so far. It comes with all the supplies you need, plus pretty straightforward instructions. I had a few questions but found answers quickly online, both on the brand's website and just from general google research. I'm still fermenting the first batch, but the taste test I did yesterday was very encouraging. Definitely tastes like the kombucha I know (just still a little too sweet). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel M Olson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ingredients, Super Easy to Make, Must Try!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my daughter for Christmas. She is 16 and loves kombucha, but it was getting very expensive to buy from the stores. After reading the reviews, I wanted to try give the GetKombucha kit a try. I helped her make the first batch (very easy to make) and she made her second batch all by herself. It does take about a week to ferment, then you can add fruit to flavor your kombucha and leave for a few more days. I highly recommend GetKombucha for any Kombucha making novice or expert.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cloth covers aren’t big enough and shed fibers into the kombucha culture
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, don’t buy this. What you get for your $40 is basically a SCOBY and some items you could obtain for a few dollars if purchased separately. I knew that when I bought the kit though, and decided a reliable SCOBY was worth $40. HOWEVER, the cloth covers 1. Weren’t big enough to fit over my vessel and 2. SHED MICROFIBER INTO MY KOMBUCHA. I really hope it’s not contaminated and ruined now. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Don't use water from your sink. It contains chlorine.
customer_reviews.text: I received almost everything I needed to achieve my goal. Not everything stated in the Amazon description was included in the box. Colorful 'How To' card that has different instructions than the very colorful and creative instruction booklet. It's a STARTER kit. Its for brain dead first time users. There are basic things left out of the info that could have caused disaster. I expect wonderful results...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wilbert

customer_reviews.title: Quit Waiting!
customer_reviews.text: Hey Kombucha lovers, I just bottled my first batch after receiving my starter kit a week + ago; it's fantastic! The Ph is just right right and the flavor is delicious (just as delicious or better than store bought). I may have to order the larger, continuous brewing system...addicted! Thanks Dave :-)
customer_reviews.author: HairyCatsNetwork

customer_reviews.title: Nice big scoby
customer_reviews.text: Nice scoby was in this kit. The size of my hand and the thickness of my finger. Instructions were easy to follow. There’s enough tea for more batches. If you use a 2gallon like I did, there’s only enough sugar for one batch. The cloth were almost to little for the size jar that I used.
customer_reviews.author: JAZmanW

customer_reviews.title: Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time making kombucha. I have heard people talk about the health benefits of drinking it and saw the high price of 16oz bottles at our nearby Whole Foods so figured it was worth a try to make it myself. The box was delivered quickly and once opened found everything neatly packaged with certified organic products. Also came with instructions which are simple to follow. Also received 2 emails from Dave with ebook and resource guide attached which I thought was great customer service. I will definitely be a returning customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pappa

customer_reviews.title: it tasted great! I waited two days before starting my next ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my kombucha starter kit on time and in tact. I couldn't wait to get started so I brewed my very first batch the same day. I live in Alabama so the temperature was no problem. I checked and started enjoying my kombucha on the fourth day ( I didn't want the fizz through a second fermentation) and it was fabulous! Unlike the way it looked, it tasted great! I waited two days before starting my next batch and I have been drinking it every since. I'm so happy I decided to try it! #best move ever
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this as I have tried other recipes to brew Kombucha myself at home, and been unsuccessful. GetKombucha has been awesome to use and work with. The starter kit was wonderful, it came with a good-sized SCOBY that's been pretty robust, plenty of tea, sugar, and other miscellany to help get going. My first few batches have turned out not only drinkable, but taste great; the website is helpful and easy to use, and the staff have been super supportive. It's more than paid for itself already. Definitely recommend this product if you're looking to start brewing Kombucha at home. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Krainer

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: This had everything I needed to successfully make kombucha for the first time, the only thing I wish it was better at would have been if it came with better instructions. The instructions were all on one page and somewhat lacked detail but had enough info to be able to make the product. Overall this was good.
customer_reviews.author: I. Radas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only includes scoby and tea so technically not a starter kit. Very expensive for scoby and loose leaf tea
customer_reviews.author: Bryson R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: thick and of a great color. If fact it was splitting and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This starter kit came with what I needed to get started, minus the gallon jar which obviously would not be in this small box. The SCOBY or mother was very high quality, thick and of a great color. If fact it was splitting and I could have really went ahead and split it and made two batches since there was enough organic sugar and tea blend sent for two batches. Also included, were gloves, pH test strips, rubber bands, two reusable tea bags and a white and black cheese cloth. Great starter kit. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: zonorock

customer_reviews.title: Easy kit for a first timer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have made Kombucha tea, and it was so easy I could not be any happier about the process. I had my first glass yesterday and it was so good that I started another batch. I would recommend this starter kit for all the newbies to brewing Kombucha tea. The kit comes with everything except the brewing jar. There is plenty of tea to make more gallons you just have to buy more sugar since you only get enough for two batches, but it is well worth the price for a starter kit with a live not dry scoby.
customer_reviews.author: BeeJay

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure yet it don’t seem to be working ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure yet it don’t seem to be working right someone told me the scouby needs to floot to top this never has. The PH has never come below 4-5
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Knepp

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service around and awesome booch to boot!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! I never realized it would be so incredibly easy to brew my own kombucha! The starter kit has everything you need to brew many batches of booch! What blew me away was the amazing customer service provided by this company. It feels like I have someone right along side me during every step of the brewing, flavoring, and bottling process. How to videos, the private fb group, and personal emails make this the friendliest company I have ever purchased from.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpschoolin

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for first timers
customer_reviews.text: We had to store the kit for about a week before using it. Storage for this length of time did not harm the scoby. The kit had all the ingredients needed to start fermenting Kombucha. All we had to do was supply the fermenting jar and bottles. Our first try was successful!
customer_reviews.author: Oldster

customer_reviews.title: great, convenient kit to start brewing kombucha
customer_reviews.text: Husband got me this kit from the website. Just finished making my first batch, very excited to taste it in a few days. However, I feel that it was too expensive for what you get ($89). The cloth provided was too small for my 2.5 gallon glass jar. Otherwise, great, convenient kit to start brewing kombucha.
customer_reviews.author: C. Helmich

customer_reviews.title: Great Introduction to Kombucha
customer_reviews.text: I've been interested in making my own Kombucha for some time and did proper research before purchasing a kit. This kit provides everything you need EXCEPT a 1 gallon jug and starter tea. The provided SCOBY is giant! The instructions are not only great, but also fun. If you've never made Kombucha before, this is a great kit to get you started.
customer_reviews.author: CORRIE

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice kit to get started with, a little pricey for what you get. But it's easier than doing lots of reading and buying things separately, just be sure you know which kit you are buying. Sometimes the pictures can be deceiving if they offer multiple kits.
customer_reviews.author: GWalker

customer_reviews.title: large and healthy SCOBY
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my purchase from GetKombucha! I received a really large and healthy SCOBY :) and started the brewing process without any difficulties. You get what you need to start right away, (make sure you have a 1 gallon glass container beforehand). The instructions are brief and clear, there are videos from the seller as well if you have questions. After 6 days my kombucha is getting already a delicious tangy taste and is almost ready to be bottled for further fermentation. Get Kombucha seller is also kind to personally send an e-mail to check all is OK :) No need to look further GetKombucha delivers a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Excited!!
customer_reviews.text: I am excited about this new venture! Have my first gallon brewing as I write this. Everything was wrapped very well and delivered in a timely manner. The SCOBY was huge however, don't think there was a full cup of the starter tea with the SCOBY. Hope it grows a baby so I can continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Try It, You'll Love It
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my 1st batch of Kombucha. If I can do it, so can you! The instructions are included in the box but, just to make sure, I downloaded someone else's instructions to add detail on making and flavoring my Kombucha, If you're new to this, make a 1 gallon batch the first time to familiarize yourself with the process. Also, be sure to have glass containers on hand and cheesecloth. Try it, you'll love it
customer_reviews.author: psymansez

customer_reviews.title: The Best Kombucha Kit !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Kombucha Starter Kit. Great for beginners like me. The directions are very clear and everything is mapped out perfectly. The ingredients are all top of the line, so I am excited to get brewing !! Thanks for such a great quality product with clearly the best and user friendly kit !
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: It felt like my throat wanted to close after doing a shot ...
customer_reviews.text: This was enough to make two batches. However, there wasn't enough sugar to make more than that. Still, the scoby did make a baby scoby and another baby scoby. I did end up giving mine to a friend. Because I think I may be sensitive to it. It felt like my throat wanted to close after doing a shot of Kombucha. The test strips tested fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit with super great taste!
customer_reviews.text: It has worked very well. Your you tube information, excellent instructions, and tea blend has been excellent. I am currently pursuing help with a question, and am sure they will responds quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gessaman

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, ask your neighbors or friends
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews, but since this product is not returnable/refundable, I want to warn others like me looking for the scoop y to start brewing kombucha instead of paying lots of money at the stores... Culture came in a little liquid not enough to start your brew according to the instructions it came with. You better ask your neighbors if they have a healthy scooby rather than spending money on this one
customer_reviews.author: wesley conrad

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Scoby!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this kit is amazing! I have ordered Scoby's before from other sellers but this one takes the cake. It arrived healthy and ready to go. The kit made it easy to get started and had everything I needed to get my first batch brewing (except a canister but I knew that when I ordered). If you want to try brewing Kombucha yourself this is the kit to get.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loves it. It was an easy way to see how to make kombucha and very affordable. Def a great gift for the kombucha lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Berens

customer_reviews.title: Nice size Scoby and website support
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and clear instructions. Nice size Scoby and website support. I waited to review until my first batch of Kombucha was ready to taste. I have purchased the brand Get Kombucha before, and this time was no different. The Kombucha has a really good flavor! I made a gallon batch first, and this time I made a 2 gallon batch in my continuous brewer.
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: WAYYYYY Better Than Store-Bought Kombucha!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this homemade kombucha kit!! Honestly, I've always bought store-bought kombucha because I thought it was too difficult to brew my own. Well, I was WRONG! This kit makes homemade kombucha brewing super fun and SUPER EASY. I'm done paying ridiculous amounts for store-bought kombucha. Homemade is way better, healthier, and a heck of a lot less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Leif Arnesen

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: All you need in the box to get started except for the water and the brewing vessel including some pH strips and large rubber bands. Clear instructions and online support. Enough tea and sugar to make a few batches. The scoby is large and healthy looking. The scoby and starter tea are packaged ready to brew so there is no period of activating the scoby. Other kombucha kits are similarly priced and include a brewing vessel but I wanted to choose my own brewing vessel. The cloth to cover the brewing vessel is small so I just used a tea towel since I have a large mouth vessel. Overall, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christa L. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in heaven. Zero trips to WF for my drink. I love love love double fermentation with Ginger. My learning curve has gone from zero to sixty in 90 days with this kit! I encourage you to watch the videos... This company is committed to making an expert out of you. It's absolutely amazing. I love my step by step instruction card... Taped to my fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving this brew!!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is good though the instructions are printed a bit small and have slightly varying info in separate places. I'd rate is 4.5 because of the instructions but the responses for emailed questions are so rapid, clear and helpful they deserve a "5".
customer_reviews.author: Ambir_d

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a bottle to drink and save some time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I never could get a good batch of kombucha. The PH was correct, but no fizz on the second ferment. I also realized that to keep the scoby going, I would have so much kombucha that I wouldn't be able to drink all of it. I just buying a bottle when I want some now.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Worked, high quality
customer_reviews.text: The tea is gorgeous, the highest quality I’ve ever seen which may explain the price tag a little steep. First batch worked like a charm. The pieces of cloth are too small for my large 2 gallon jar but no issue, I used my own.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: MISREPRESENTED
customer_reviews.text: This was an expensive kit for just sugar and tea. THE ORDER PAGE MADE IT LOOK LIKE YOU WERE GETTING THE CROCK TOO. The culture seemed ok but quickly went moldy. Had to throw the whole thing out! A waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scoby was not viable
customer_reviews.text: I’m an experienced Kombucha brewer and was disappointed with the scoby. After 2 weeks no signs of life. Perhaps the scoby deteriorated with shipping!
customer_reviews.author: R P Doss MD

customer_reviews.title: Much easier than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Just completed my first batch. Bought a big cookie jar to ferment in. The Facebook group helped me figure out minor tweaks I needed to be successful with brewing. I bought bottles off Amazon that also worked out well. Can't wait to make more and experiment.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Most items missing
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit because the pictures showed it came with different flavors we could add to the kombucha and it seemed to have a very nice kombucha guide. However, what we got had none of the flavors and the “guide” was a half page instructions that were not detailed and specific at all. Do not buy this,
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My scoby is so beautiful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Kombucha starter kit arrived today. So excited to FINALLY get my own brew started. My scoby, Gracie, looks beautiful and healthy......just like in the pictures!!! The quick start guide is easy to follow. The tea blend is.....WOW!!! That is some really good looking, nice smelling tea!!! I can tell by looking at it that has been blended from the highest quality of tea available. Everything in the box is exactly as advertised. Can't wait to start tasting my Kombucha on day 4!!!!! I have been going to do this for 2 years!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Kit! Everything you need, quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! I just started my first batch. I have brewed a couple of batches of kombucha with moderate success from a scoby from a friend. I am excited to know I have a proven high-quality scoby and ingredients with which to start fresh.as well as personal, one on one support! The scopy is large and think and very handsome, it will be fun to watch him grow. I am very impressed with the quality of the product and the service, absolutely refreshing and confidence building. I feel like I'm becoming part of a new community.
customer_reviews.author: E. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: kombucha
customer_reviews.text: I have managed to make two batches so far and they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: J Lozada

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT KIT! I just bottled my first batch and so far,so good! I really like the fact that Get Kombucha Dave is so willing to help with our success in making and loving Kombucha as much as he does. I haven had a need to correspond with him yet, but he seems to be completely willing to help or congratulate! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DebM

customer_reviews.title: So as far as kits go this is a great place to start
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed was in this starter kit. I already had a brewer, as I have done this before, but took a short break while pregnant. So as far as kits go this is a great place to start. I like brewing my own versus buying because I can control the flavors and sweetness. The scoby was good size and in great condition when it arrived. I highly recommend Get Kombucha.
customer_reviews.author: ohiomom

customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions exactly, the batch grew mold within one week of making it. I think something was off with the actual scoby. Very disappointed that I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Murry

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, do your own rsearch
customer_reviews.text: You can get all of this for much cheaper by buying a $7 scoby, $3 sugar and $12 of tea. It really isn't worth it once you do a little research.
customer_reviews.author: Professor M. Link

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Comes with everything except a fermenting jar and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Comes with everything except a fermenting jar and a funnel if you think you'll need one. Am on my third round of brewing and now have a second mature scoby so I can start fermenting two gallons at once. Buying this kit is also much cheaper, my friend bought all of her supplies individually and it ended up costing about $20 extra. Great Deal, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can make it successfully
customer_reviews.text: I really like the instruction sheet that was laminated so I taped it to the inside of my cabinet door for easy access. So easy to make also
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should try kombucha at least ONCE
customer_reviews.text: I love kombucha. I just discovered this AMAZING, POWERFUL drink a few years ago. I have tried several brands and wanted to try making my own. This starter kit was PERFECT and ORGANIC. Being chemical free is a must for me. The SCOBY was pretty and healthy. The kit had everything you needed to get started; even the pH strips and rubber band. I'm still working on getting my kombucha flavored the way I want, but I'll get there. Don't be scared! Everyone should make kombucha at least ONCE in their lifetime. I drink it everyday and couldn't function without it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Make your own Kombucha at home
customer_reviews.text: Starter kit has everything you need to make kombucha except a fermenting container.The tea smells wonderful. The instructions are clear and easy to follow. Within 15 mins had first batch going this will save money and I look forward to experimenting with flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Terrific alternative to expensive store-bought kombucha
customer_reviews.text: Terrific alternative to expensive store-bought kombucha, which has become a staple in my family's diet. This starter kit was more than adequate to get this new hobby kicked off, though I did need to supplement it with a fermentation jar, funnels, bottles and a recipe book. I'm delighted to know that Dave and the Kombuchaholics have my back in case I have any questions, issues or problems with my set-up. My initial batch is fermenting right now; looking forward to a lot of experimentation and a healthy 2018 ahead.
customer_reviews.author: R.C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and a great way to start your Kombucha ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and a great way to start your Kombucha journey. All of the supplies you need to start bucha'ing are included and the directions make it super easy to figure out. The scoby that was sent was super healthy and is now a great grandfather to many new scoby spawns that now reside in a Scoby hotel. Videos that go along with the website are super helpful too. Thanks for a great product and delivery! Check out my strawberry and apple buch currently rocking out in their 2nd ferment!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Donaleski

customer_reviews.title: Nervous about making kombucha? Don't feel nervous anymore!
customer_reviews.text: After reading so much information on the Brewing of Kombucha I honestly was very intimidated. This kit though was so easy to deal with and had great instructions and all the supplies you need. It came with the tea, the tea bags, scoby, cloth cover and rubber band , gloves, and really easy to follow instructions. I now make kombucha all the time and have 3 gallon jars Brewing constantly. My fear has been overcome! Anyone who feels nervous about making kombucha shouldn't feel the least bit nervous with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Landsgaard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kombucha!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful starter kit! Scoby is huge, healthy and working effectively. After two weeks, another scoby is growing off the mother scoby and we are going to make two batches by splitting them into two. Its taste is also amazing (we usually brew it for 5 days and the taste for me is ideal), lightly sweet and sour! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: dialethics85

customer_reviews.title: Go get it!
customer_reviews.text: It's two years ago when we started brewing. And the Scoby and Tea of Get Kombucha is a perfect match. This is now my second purchase for my family in San Diego. If you're thinking of starting. This is the set. Go Brew, Get Kombucha! (By the way, we are from the Philippines! The tropics is perfect for fermentation all year round!)
customer_reviews.author: NTT

customer_reviews.title: Just get the scoby
customer_reviews.text: I went with the beginner set so I did everything correctly. There was no more information with the kit than what you can find online. I feel I spent a lot of money that I didn't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Koleen Alin

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent SCOBY, great starter kit. I've been brewing for a few months now, and it's as easy as can be. I need to order more tea, I've since ran out, but it lasted a good long while. I make 2 gallons about every 2 weeks, and the tea lasted for a few months. Sugar runs out pretty quick though. For the price, I do agree that a 1 gallon jar would be a nice addition to the kit for a truly complete starter package, but it's a minor gripe. It's a fun and easy experiment, and now i have kombucha to drink every morning. I've also given SCOBYs to several friends who now brew as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit, Super Easy to Make!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter introduced me to Kombucha, which like all things is too expensive to keep buying at Whole Foods! I did a little research and found the Kombucha Starter Kit on-line. It was here with in two days. The kit is well organized and the ingredients seem to be very high quality. To make things better, there is s support website with YouTube videos that walks you through how to make your first batch. Got it sitting in a closet and am counting the days until it is ready!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hunt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kit if you want to try brewing your own ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit if you want to try brewing your own kombucha. Comes with everything needed to get you going. The instructions are clear with no fuss. I also watched some of the Get Kombucha videos before starting. Make sure you read through to instructions first because it takes some time to get started - cool the brewed sweet tea - don't scold your scoby! My first batch turned out so yummy, I decided to buy the continuous brewing system. I really like the tea blend too. This starter kits is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Not good experience here
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions but my scoby was struggling to survive. I couldn’t contact anyone to place my concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: It's simply the best!!!!  For Real though!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best represented sale item. The kit is amazing and the link to the video to do step by step with explanation made the process not intimidating at all. I honestly could not be happier. Just waiting for my kombucha to be ready for drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: this company is great: personal correspondence
customer_reviews.text: hello, this company is great: personal correspondence, great products...this kit is perfect...i bought four...the scobys look beautiful...i am boiling and filtering water to make 2 gallon starter batch...like it says on the box: easy, safe, and fun...i picked up some big blue eazy cap bottles but couldn't figure out how to put the caps on, that was the most difficult part of this whole process...my friends are interested in what i'm doing: i linked them to the website...thanks for all the good info and great products...cheers...j
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Get Kombucha Kombucha Starter Kit, Brewing Bundle for 5 gallons of Organic Tea, Vegan, GMO, and Gluten-Free Kombucha
feature_bullets: 𝐓𝐇𝐄 𝐎𝐑𝐈𝐆𝐈𝐍𝐀𝐋 𝐊𝐎𝐌𝐁𝐔𝐂𝐇𝐀 𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐑𝐓𝐄𝐑 𝐊𝐈𝐓 - Our original starter kit includes everything you need to start brewing your own kombucha today! The Original Kombucha starter kit includes our 6.5” Scoby, 1 4-oz. Kombucha Tea Blend, 1 lb. organic cane sugar, 5 pH strips, 2 cloth covers, 2 rubber bands, 2 reusable muslin bags, 1 pair of gloves, 4 botanical packs and our Kombucha Brewer's Handbook.

𝐇𝐀𝐕𝐄 𝐐𝐔𝐄𝐒𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍𝐒? 𝐆𝐄𝐓 𝐄𝐗𝐏𝐄𝐑𝐈𝐄𝐍𝐂𝐄𝐃 𝐀𝐍𝐒𝐖𝐄𝐑𝐒 𝐈𝐍𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐓𝐋𝐘 - We have one of the most engaged communities of kombucha fanatics in the world! Since 2006, we’ve built a kombucha starter community of over 400,000 first time brewers, who have all elevated to become veterans!

𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐊 𝐓𝐎𝐔𝐆𝐇 & 𝐈𝐍𝐃𝐔𝐒𝐓𝐑𝐘 𝐋𝐄𝐀𝐃𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐒𝐂𝐎𝐁𝐘 - when it comes to size and durability. Don’t worry about us shipping our scobies in COLD OR HOT WEATHER. We engineered our 6.5 inch in diameter scobies to withstand the shipping process in more extreme temperatures. Assuring our Kombucha kit starter arrives unharmed to your door or your money back.

𝐈𝐌𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐕𝐄 𝐃𝐈𝐆𝐄𝐒𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍, 𝐋𝐎𝐒𝐄 𝐖𝐄𝐈𝐆𝐇𝐓, 𝐑𝐄𝐃𝐔𝐂𝐄 𝐒𝐓𝐑𝐄𝐒𝐒, 𝐑𝐄𝐕𝐈𝐓𝐀𝐋𝐈𝐙𝐄 𝐘𝐎𝐔𝐑 𝐈𝐌𝐌𝐔𝐍𝐄 𝐒𝐘𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐌 & 𝐈𝐍𝐂𝐑𝐄𝐀𝐒𝐄 𝐄𝐍𝐄𝐑𝐆𝐘 - These are the HEALTHY BENEFITS that our customers rave about repeatedly. It’s no surprise either, when so many scientifically proven ingredients are infused into our kombucha... Like: Vitamin B1, B2, B6, B12, C, Malic, Acetic, Gluconic and Butyric Acid, Probiotics and so much more!

𝐖𝐎𝐑𝐑𝐘-𝐅𝐑𝐄𝐄 𝐆𝐔𝐀𝐑𝐀𝐍𝐓𝐄𝐄! - We meticulously and continuously inspect and validate every kombucha brewing kit for potency, purity, safety and effect in our GMP & USDA Organic certified natural lab. Try it risk free, and LOVE YOUR RESULTS or expect a full, prompt, friendly refund or exchange – whatever makes you happiest!
